DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the superiority of MD1003 over placebo in the visual improvement of patients suffering from chronic visual loss resulting from multiple sclerosis related optic neuritis.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of MD1003 in Chronic Visual Loss Related to Optic Neuritis in Multiple Sclerosis
